name: Starship Helmet
description:
You wakes up in the mysterious space, and you will bring the helmet around you. Choose the role you want to play (space warship or space monster or ???)
Discovery the unknown random universe, find treasures, collect cards, and defeat the enemy with your unparalleled wisdom and decisiveness.
What have you failed again? Try agian , don't forget to find the planet bomb and enter the secret space. The treasure inside is enough to make you stronger.

The Starship Helmet is a sci-fi Rogue-Like deck builder game developed by LongGe alone. It combines card games (slay the spire,dream quest) and traditional rogue like games (pixel dungeon) togeter. You need to survive in a completely randomly generated space hexagonal maze, discover secret chambers, collect cards and treasures to improve your strength, and finally find the wormhole to the next layer.

Now, the game has 7 fully randomly generated maze levels, 2 completely different characters, nearly 100 cards, and 50+ different items.
In each game, you need to make the best choice based on the actual situation to defeat the enemy.

The only developer of the game thinks this is a good Rogue-Like game. Even though he played this game hundreds of times with all the game information, he always expect to try gain (expecting the next game will hava a better luck).
if you have already cleared the levels, you can try other card combinations.

Sounds like this game is really good~~
!!!,However, the game has a fatal flaw - all the art skills (Painting, UI, 3d modeling) of the developer (coder) are self-taught. So the game sales are bleak, he is starving ...
